title: A Whole New World of Color - MagMod MagGels

json.text: Let’s be real:
dealing with flimsy gels is pretty lame.
Cutting ‘em up, taping or velcroing them onto your flash, and then reattaching them
when they fall off…all of that just to alter the color of your flash?
Ain’t nobody got time for that!
So, we made our own, and they’re pretty friggin sweet.
Unlike old school flimsy gels, MagMod’s polycarbonate gels are rigid and durable.
These puppies were designed to take a beating.
Transforming your color has never been faster or easier with the MagGel:
a hassle-free gel holder that secures up to 3 gels at once—all in a matter of seconds.
We also designed integrated gel slots into several other MagMod modifiers to make gellin’
and light shaping super easy to do.
And thanks to MagMod’s modular design, you can even stack a MagGrid with a MagGel, and
a MagSphere to give you more control than you’ve ever had from a speedlite modifier.
MagMod’s 8 Standard Gels are designed to balance color temperatures in a variety of
shooting conditions.
Want to kick things up a notch?
Add our Creative and Artistic Gels to transform a not-so-interesting light setup into a thing
of beauty.
Use them once and you’ll open your photography up to a whole new world of color.
When you’re ready to store ‘em, we suggest our ruggedly handsome MagGel Wallet.
Its new magnetic design has 4 folding panels that hold tons of gels or MagMasks.
With gels this easy to manage, you can work quicker and more efficiently to create the
look you want in-camera.
Want to master flash photography?
Join our Facebook group where you’ll find us hanging out with a few thousand of your
fellow photographers sharing tips and feedback in a friendly, troll-free forum every single
day.
So join up and say ‘hi.’ We want to see how you rock your MagMod. Don’t be shy.
Thanks to MagMod, you’ll work faster, easier, and more efficiently than you ever did before.
Fast
Easy
Awesome
That's MagMod
